mapper.select: SELECT CB_NO, CB_TITLE, CB_CONTENT, CB_DATE, CB_URL, C.EMP_NO, CLUB_CODE, CLUB_NAME, E.EMP_NAME, CLUB_PROFILE FROM HR_CLUB_BOARD B JOIN HR_CLUB C USING (CLUB_CODE) JOIN HR_EMPLOYEES E ON E.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO ORDER BY CB_DATE DESC

SELECT CB_NO, CB_TITLE, CB_CONTENT, CB_DATE, CB_URL, C.EMP_NO, CLUB_CODE, CLUB_NAME, CLUB_PROFILE FROM HR_CLUB_BOARD B JOIN HR_CLUB C USING (CLUB_CODE) WHERE CLUB_CODE IN(select CLUB_CODE FROM HR_emp_club WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}) ORDER BY CB_DATE DESC
select CB_NO, CB_TITLE, EMP_NO, CLUB_CODE, CB_CONTENT from HR_club_board where EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY CB_DATE DESC

SELECT CB_NO, CB_TITLE, CB_CONTENT, CB_DATE, CB_URL, E.EMP_NO, C.CLUB_CODE, CLUB_NAME, EMP_NAME, CLUB_PROFILE FROM HR_CLUB_BOARD B JOIN HR_CLUB C ON C.CLUB_CODE = B.CLUB_CODE JOIN HR_EMPLOYEES E ON E.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO WHERE CB_NO = #{cbNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HR_CLUB_BOARD (CB_TITLE, CB_CONTENT, CB_URL, EMP_NO, CLUB_CODE) VALUES (#{cbTitle}, #{cbContent}, #{cbURL}, #{empNo}, #{clubCode})
